marklogic.body: Marion beating Vika makes me seriously happy. YOu asked in your last post who we preferred as #1, Caroline or Vika, and to that I answer Yogi Bear. I'm also finding Aga's continued success against top players surprising, but I like her. Watched the last set of Rafa/Jo online--where I can just barely make out the ball--so my concept of what took place is dodgy. But it was exciting as all hell. I was more concerned how Rafa didn't close on his serve 2nd set. Don't know what to think about the knee. But know what I think about his need to use the FHDTL way more. Let me harp on it! Saw this again against JO, it almost works for him as a point-ender, and he doesn't do it enough. I thought Jo was playing v well in the 3rd set, and when Jo's playing well, he's as good as anyone. I'll take that as a propitious sign for Rafa in the \matches to come. From what I saw of Murray, I think Rafa will handle him easily. Of course maybe the stomach bug explains Murray's less-than-impressive showing. I still don't get why anyone likes him, because aside from his charm-free personality, his tennis isn't even that interesting. Is COld a DH story? I used to love SOns and Lovers. One of my brothers left an unfinished \PHd on Lawrence, so I Always perk up when his name is mentioned. The film Women in Love was one of the very first I saw that was sexually candid so I never forgot it, and of course how can one forget Glenda Jackson and Oliver Reed, or Reed and Bates wrestling nude in front of a fire ...but I digress. Missed you in the chat last night. Saw you were there earlier before I got on. Oh well. Maybe for Murray, or DJok, cuz that's where were headed. Gulp.
